KNC Beauty Big Glo Face Mask

Brand: KNC Beauty

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Trehalose, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Fruit Extract, Rosa Damascena Extract, Beta-Carotene, Lilium Candidum Flower Extract, Bisabolol, Mica, Allantoin, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Prunus Persic

) Oil, Prunus Persica (Peach) Kernel Oil, Rosa Canina (Rose Hip) Seed Oil, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
